channel.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
channel.description: > # [color=grey]Soulbinder[/color] > **[color=grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** > > Passive: Bound Soul: Any negative effects (death, bleeding, occupation, etc.) will be redirected to your bound target. Prince executes bypass this. Bypasses Immunity. People aren't informed that they were redirected. > > Day Ability: Bind Soul: Bind yourself to someone. Unlimited uses, 1 day cool down. > > Day Ability: Manipulate: Force your target to vote for someone, and prevent them from voting for the rest of the day. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Hex: Kill everybody who visits your target. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Soul Shock: Kill your bound target. Bypasses immunity. 1 day cool down.

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
This is basically a shaman reskin isn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Everything that doesn’t say it isn’t a visit is a visit. It doesn’t say it isn’t a visit, therefore it is one.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Wisp is not a visit, maybe the new wisp is though

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I figured they wouldn’t be informed.

I should probably add that.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I guess I might be misinformed then.

If it ignores immunity, it’ll instantly out the Soulbinder when a Butler/Drunk tries to wine/deb him, because they’ll suddenly be redirected, which only a Soulbinder could do. Or the Butler/Drunk won’t be notified of the target swap?

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Follow and Wisp both count as visits

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Solic:

How does the passive interact with butler/drunk, since they are redirect immune?

It ignores immunity.

Solic:

Follow and wisp do not count as visit.

It never says that anywhere.

I’ll make Soul Shock bypass immunity.

Bind Soul and Soul Shock are for killing classes that you can’t catch in Hex.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Follow and wisp do not count as visit. Follow is the primary ability of Observer and I said partly princess. Noble can also visit with snoop, but his primary ability is spy.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Lily
item.description:
Observer and Princess can visit people.

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Does not have a great way to deal with non visiting classes like Observer, King, Prince, Psychic, Hunter, partly Noble and Princess. Soul shock should also go through night immunity in my opinion. How does the passive interact with butler/drunk, since they are redirect immune?

Read full topic

item.title: Soulbinder (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Soulbinder

Neutral Killer

Passive: Bound Soul: Any negative effects (death, bleeding, occupation, etc.) will be redirected to your bound target. Prince executes bypass this. Bypasses Immunity. People aren’t informed that they were redirected.

Day Ability: Bind Soul: Bind yourself to someone. Unlimited uses, 1 day cool down.

Day Ability: Manipulate: Force your target to vote for someone, and prevent them from voting for the rest of the day. Unlimited uses.

Night Ability: Hex: Kill everybody who visits your target. Unlimited uses.

Night Ability: Soul Shock: Kill your bound target. Bypasses immunity. 1 day cool down.

Read full topic
